translation.en: Hide.
Here we come! When Energon struck a Mall nearby
translation.es: - ¡Vamos! - Energon cayó sobre un centro comercial

translation.en: We became more than meets the eye
We're everyday objects, Motionless parts
We burst to life to let the party start!
BotBots! We could be anything
translation.es: Cobramos vida para celebrar. ¡BotBots! - Somos muchas cosas. - ¡BotBots!

translation.en: BotBots! Like a hot dog or ice cream
translation.es: - Somos muchas cosas. - ¡BotBots! - Una salchicha o un helado. - ¡BotBots!

translation.en: BotBots! Mischief without a care
translation.es: - Una salchicha o un helado. - ¡BotBots! - Travesuras sin cuidado. - ¡BotBots!

translation.en: BotBots! Secret robots everywhere
translation.es: - Travesuras sin cuidado. - ¡BotBots! Robots secretos en todos lados.

translation.en: BotBots! Here we come!
BotBots! BotBots!
- BOTBOTS! - It's Bot Bot time, y'all!
Operation: Secret Shindig is online!
translation.es: Empieza la operación Fiesta secreta. ¡A celebrar!

translation.en: Ten- hut, soldier! Bombs away!
Fastball, right down the center!
Grand slam, baby!
Yeah, we're gonna do it! We're gonna whooaaa!
-  - We did it!
translation.es: Sí, lo lograremos, vamos a… ¡Lo hicimos!

translation.en: The flesh creature's coming!
What in the world is going on here?
Ah, I thought I still had more episodes left.
How am I ever going to find more podcasts?
Ooohh, someone missed the can, huh?
Well, score one for Dave!
Ughh what flavor is that? Gross!
Fottle Barts - splatter power!
Thanks, Spud Muffin. Close call!
Come on, I fired up the fryer heat lamps.
translation.es: Encendí las lámparas de la freidora.

translation.en: Time to get our tans on!
Nah, tanning makes me peel.
translation.es: No, me da piel de naranja.

translation.en: Besides, Burgertron and I are
Wait - has anyone seen Burgertron?
Hmm, not since last night. Wonder where he went
Well, that was a bizarre series of embarrassing events
translation.es: Todo fue muy vergonzoso y nunca más lo mencionaré.

translation.en: I never want to discuss. But now I can get back to
translation.es: Todo fue muy vergonzoso y nunca más lo mencionaré. Ahora puedo volver a…

translation.en: Wait. What is this awful place?
Oh, come on! Who are you? And why all the-- -  - pain?
We're playing! We're just super super excited
translation.es: ¡Estamos jugando! ¡Nos alegra mucho ver a alguien nuevo!

translation.en: to see someone new!
translation.es: ¡Nos alegra mucho ver a alguien nuevo!

translation.en: Playing isn't supposed to hurt!
- Wait what now? - Whoa!
I'm in the lost and found,
you're the Lost Bots? - No!
Yes. Maybe? What's a Lost Bot?
translation.es: Si. ¿Tal vez? ¿Qué es un Lost Bot?

translation.en: We've heard rumors about you, but I didn't think they were true.
translation.es: Sabía de ustedes, pensé que no era cierto.

translation.en: When the Energon cloud hit and we came to life,
translation.es: Cuando Energon cayó y cobramos vida,

translation.en: you were all stuck in here.
You probably don't even know about the rest of us
in the Mall! - You are saying a lot of words,
translation.es: ¡Quizá no saben del resto! Dices muchas palabras y conozco un par,

translation.en: and I know some of them, but I'm getting confused
translation.es: Dices muchas palabras y conozco un par, pero me confundes con pensar y Energon.

translation.en: by words like mall and also think.
translation.es: pero me confundes con pensar y Energon.

translation.en: Okay, first of all, I'm Burgertron.
Oooh! We have names too!
I'm Dimlit, that's Kikmee, Bonz- Eye, and Clogstopper.
translation.es: Yo soy Dimlit, ellos son Kikmee, Bonz-Eye y Clogstopper.

translation.en: This room we're in is the Lost & Found.
translation.es: Este cuarto es de objetos perdidos.

translation.en: See? You are here.
How does it know? How does the map know where we are?!
translation.es: ¿Cómo sabe? ¿Cómo el mapa sabe dónde estamos?

translation.en: But the rest of the Mall out here? This is the ENTIRE UNIVERSE!
translation.es: El resto del Centro Comercial es todo el universo.

translation.en: And all of us Bots belong to a different squad!
translation.es: Y los bots pertenecemos a distintos squads.

translation.en: Like the Jock Squad! If all your shoes have cleats
translation.es: ¡Como el Jock Squad! Si tienen botines o son botines,

translation.en: or you actually are a shoe with cleats, this is your crew!
translation.es: Si tienen botines o son botines, este es su grupo.

translation.en: Then we've got the Sugar Shocks.
They talk three times faster than any of us
and I kinda get a stomachache just hanging out near them.
translation.es: y si los veo me duele la barriga.

translation.en: The Gamer Geeks control all the Mall systems
translation.es: Los Gamer Geeks controlan los sistemas

translation.en: so we're never on the Security Guard's monitors.
translation.es: para que el guardia no nos vea.

translation.en: And then there's the Custodial Crew who
translation.es: Y luego están los Custodial Crew…

translation.en: eh, actually you know what, the less I tell you about them,
the better to be honest. There's a bunch more squads,
translation.es: Mientras menos sepan, mejor. Hay más squads, pero vamos al importante,

translation.en: but let's get to the most important one of all,
translation.es: Hay más squads, pero vamos al importante,

translation.en: the Hunger Hubs, who rule the Food Court,
translation.es: los Hunger Hubs, del patio de comidas,

translation.en: led by their fearless and handsome leader, me!
translation.es: liderados por su valiente y apuesto líder, yo.

translation.en: But I had a tiny mishap, and now I gotta get back.
translation.es: Pero tuve un inconveniente y debo volver.

translation.en: My friends must be going nuts without the Captain of Fun.
translation.es: Mis amigos deben estar locos sin su capitán.

translation.en: That's what I-- they-- call me.
translation.es: Así me llamo… Así me llaman.

translation.en: There's a Jock Squad?
A team of me's?!
The thought alone just made me hit my daily step count!
translation.es: De solo pensarlo casi corro un maratón.

translation.en: Normally, I'd be suspicious of wild tales told by fried meat
translation.es: En general sospecharía de los cuentos de una hamburguesa,

translation.en: but in my heart, I've always felt misplaced.
translation.es: pero siempre me sentí fuera de lugar.

translation.en: As if I were distant from where I truly belong.
translation.es: Como si estuviera lejos de donde pertenezco.

translation.en: Lost and forgotten. The two words that describe us best.
translation.es: Perdido y olvidado. Las dos palabras que nos describen.

translation.en: Oh that's sad! You should go find your Squads.
translation.es: Qué triste. Busquen sus squads, hay amigos que no conocen.

translation.en: You've got friends out there you've never even met yet!
translation.es: Busquen sus squads, hay amigos que no conocen.

translation.en: What is friends?
Friends is, are-- only the most important thing in the world!
translation.es: Un amigo… Es… ¡Lo más importante del mundo!

translation.en: Look, that's the sweet love of my life, Ulf the Orange
translation.es: Este es el amor de mi vida, Ulf the Orange,

translation.en: and my best- bro, Spud Muffin.
translation.es: y mi mejor amigo, Spud Muffin.

translation.en: Together we're a supersized combo meal of happiness! Any- who, I gotta run. Bye!
translation.es: Juntos somos el mejor combo feliz. Debo irme. ¡Adiós!

translation.en: Oh, wait!
My whole life I've been a team player without a team!
I wanna come with you and find where I belong!
translation.es: Quiero ir contigo y ver adónde pertenezco.

translation.en: I do as well. For too long, I've been a warrior without a cause.
translation.es: Yo también. Soy una guerrera sin causa.

translation.en: And I've been a flashlight!
What? Aren't we just listing stuff that we were?
Alright then, to our squads!
Seriously how does it know?!
All clear. Stealth mission: Go.
Take cover!
I must imagine what I want the most, repeat five times. I must imagine what I want the most, repeat five times.
translation.es: Debo imaginar lo que más quiero, repite cinco veces.

translation.en: Wait, was I supposed to say that last part?
-  It's horrible! - Okay.
translation.es: Es horrible. Es hora de que aprendan

translation.en: Time you all learned--
-- The Sacred Rule of the Mall!
translation.es: la regla sagrada del Centro Comercial.

translation.en: No Bot may ever, I repeat, EVER,
translation.es: Ningún bot jamás… Repito. Jamás debe revelar a las criaturas de piel que existimos.

translation.en: reveal to the flesh beings that we exist. Got it?
translation.es: Repito. Jamás debe revelar a las criaturas de piel que existimos.

translation.en: But that creature seems nice.
Nice? That thing EATS burgers!
translation.es: ¿Amable? Esa cosa come hamburguesas, poda plantas y patea pelotas.

translation.en: And prunes plants! And kicks soccer balls!
translation.es: Esa cosa come hamburguesas, poda plantas y patea pelotas.

translation.en: And let me tell you, you do NOT want to know what it does with plungers!
translation.es: No les diré qué hace con desatascadores.

translation.en: What does it do with flashlights?
Well it I mean, it just kinda holds them.
I would like to be held.
No! Trust me, if we ever even came close to revealing
translation.es: ¡No! Si llegáramos a revelarle nuestra existencia

translation.en: our existence to that air- breathing gas- emitter,
translation.es: ¡No! Si llegáramos a revelarle nuestra existencia a ese emisor de gases,

translation.en: there would be MAJOR consequences!
So, we've gotta get from down here up to the second floor
translation.es: Entonces debemos ir al patio de comidas

translation.en: Food Court without being spotted. Copy?
translation.es: del segundo piso sin que nos vea.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't see how we're getting past
translation.es: No sé cómo podamos vencer la defensa.

translation.en: this defense, coach. - Never fear.
translation.es: No sé cómo podamos vencer la defensa. No teman.

translation.en: If there's one thing you learn from a brilliant leader like me,
translation.es: Algo que aprenderán de un líder sabio como yo

translation.en: Lost Bots - never give up!
translation.es: Algo que aprenderán de un líder sabio como yo es a no rendirse.

translation.en: I have an idea that cannot fail!
translation.es: Tengo una idea que no fallará.

translation.en: - Alright, Lost Bots-- ready? -  Ready!
- Soup! - Floor it, Kikmee!
Hold on tight!
As long as we keep quiet, nothing can go wrong!
translation.es: Si vamos en silencio, todo irá bien.

translation.en: - Why?! - The flesh being.
- THE FLESH BEING! -
Nevermind, false alarm.
WAIT! Some sort of metal jaws of death!
-  - I accept my fate.
Don't worry, that's just the escalator.
Those metal jaws of life will lead us
translation.es: Nos llevará directo al patio de comidas

translation.en: right to the Food Court, as smooth a ride as--
translation.es: Nos llevará directo al patio de comidas en un paseo tranquilo…

translation.en: See?  Told you  Smooth
Can you say flawless?
What in the living heck!
Why are a plant, a flashlight, a plunger,
translation.es: ¿Una planta, una linterna, un desatascador y una pelota?

translation.en: and a soccer ball on a train?! Do they even have tickets?!
translation.es: ¿Una planta, una linterna, un desatascador y una pelota? ¿Tienen boletos?

translation.en: An abandoned burgery?!
Oh,my self affirmation podcast was right!
translation.es: Mi podcast de autoestima tenía razón.

translation.en: I imagined what I wanted most - and it came true!
translation.es: Imaginé lo que más quería y apareció.

translation.en: And so this is how I,
translation.es: Y así es como yo, el amado héroe Burgertron,

translation.en: the beloved hero Burgertron, will meet my end.
translation.es: Y así es como yo, el amado héroe Burgertron, conoceré mi final.

translation.en: Goodbye sweet mall, remember me
Little robots?! Gah!
Ah, there's no way you imagined that, right, Dave?
translation.es: No puede ser tu imaginación, Dave.

translation.en: I mean those were robots in disguise?
Oh no, gotta get this thing back
translation.es: Ay, no. Debo devolver esto antes de que me culpen.

translation.en: before I get blamed for this mess! Okay, Lets go.
translation.es: Debo devolver esto antes de que me culpen.

translation.en: Ah this music is giving me circus camp flashbacks.
translation.es: Esta música me recuerda al campamento de circo.

translation.en: Guessing that wasn't part of the plan, coach?
translation.es: Eso no era parte del plan, ¿cierto?

translation.en: Thanks for the save, Dimlit, but unfortunately we just broke--
-- The Sacred Rule of the Mall.
Spud Muffin! Ulf! Uh
Didja miss me?! Course you did. But I'm back! Yay!
Don't yay us! Total jerk- move you just pulled,
translation.es: No digas eso. Fue una idiotez, te revelaste a una criatura de piel.

translation.en: revealing yourself to a flesh creature! Unforgivable.
translation.es: Fue una idiotez, te revelaste a una criatura de piel. ¡Imperdonable!

translation.en: You were the last bot I'd ever expect to give away our secret.
translation.es: Jamás creí que tú revelarías nuestro secreto.

translation.en: What have you become, Burgie?
Oh! You saw that? Well, uh,
translation.es: ¿Vieron eso? Al menos fueron ustedes. Si los otros hubieran…

translation.en: at least it was just you guys. Oh man, if the others had--
translation.es: Al menos fueron ustedes. Si los otros hubieran…

translation.en: Oh.. hey good news!
translation.es: Bueno… El capitán de la diversión volvió.

translation.en: The Captain of Fun's back! Passport for carousing!
translation.es: El capitán de la diversión volvió. Pasaporte para la fiesta.

translation.en: Passport revoked bro- mide.
You broke the only rule we have!
A flesh being knows we exist! That puts Mall life in jeopardy.
translation.es: Una criatura de piel sabe que existimos, y nos pone en riesgo.

translation.en: Consider yourself out of the Hunger Hubs.
translation.es: Estás fuera de los Hunger Hubs.

translation.en: And I seriously doubt anyone else is gonna wanna hang with you now
translation.es: Y dudo que alguien más quiera estar contigo.

translation.en: or with your weird new friends!
translation.es: O con tus nuevos amigos raros.

translation.en: He called us your weird friends.
translation.es: Dijo que somos tus amigos raros.

translation.en: Yeah, sorry about that.
That means Weird Most Important Thing In The World!
translation.es: Significa: los raros más importantes del mundo.

translation.en: No one has ever said anything nicer to us!
I know! And did you see that other ball? And that bat?
translation.es: ¡Sí! ¿Y vieron la pelota y el bate?

translation.en: There really are squads for all of us!
I'm maxxed out on excitement! I'm in the ZONE!
But your squads won't want to take you back now! I ruined everything!
translation.es: Pero sus squads no los recibirán. ¡Arruiné todo!

translation.en: Your plan did not go like you hoped. And your friends rejected you.
translation.es: Tu plan no salió bien y tus amigos te rechazaron.

translation.en: And you were humiliated in front of everyone you've ever known
but didn't a brilliant leader teach us to never give up?
translation.es: pero un líder sabio nos enseñó a no rendirnos nunca.

translation.en: Yeah. Can't we try again tomorrow?
You know, you're right.
This is just a setback. A big one, sure,
translation.es: Es un contratiempo. Uno grande, pero es solo el comienzo.

translation.en: but this is only the beginning!
translation.es: Uno grande, pero es solo el comienzo.

translation.en: No one'll believe I saw them-- yet.
translation.es: Nadie me creerá que los vi… Por ahora.

translation.en: But there is no way they'll escape my brilliant and cunning plans!
translation.es: Pero no escaparán a mis planes brillantes.

translation.en: This is only the beginning!
-  - Mommy?
Nothing like rousing kazoo music to get the Energon pumping!
translation.es: Nada como el kazoo para despertarse con Energon.

translation.en: Burgertron why?
You Lost Bots probably aren't used to getting up
translation.es: No están acostumbrados a despertarse apenas cierra,

translation.en: at the crack of closing, but if we're going to get accepted back
translation.es: No están acostumbrados a despertarse apenas cierra, pero si volveremos a nuestros squads, no perdamos tiempo.

translation.en: by our squads, we have no time to waste.
translation.es: pero si volveremos a nuestros squads, no perdamos tiempo.

translation.en: We need the perfect plan.
- And guess what? - You're a ventriloquist!
What? Why would-- ?
I have the perfect plan! Follow me!
No one ever asks if I'm a ventriloquist.
translation.es: Nadie me preguntó si yo era ventrílocuo.

translation.en: You aren't.
Hey bros, bro- ettes, various bro- dentities.
Spud Muffin here, just doin' what I do, NBD.
Check it: COUCH SURFING!
See? If there's one thing all the Bots love, it's a dope BotVid.
translation.es: Hay una cosa que les encanta a todos, los botvids.

translation.en: Totally. And that Spud Muffin is a hunk!
translation.es: Sí. Y Spud Muffin es un papacito.

translation.en: What poise! What charm!
Yeah, he's got sort of a sidekick charm maybe.
translation.es: Sí, tiene encanto de actor secundario.

translation.en: But that's not the point. Look at how everybody loves BotVids!
translation.es: Pero no es el punto. Todos aman los botvids.

translation.en: Uh, cool Bots make BotVids. We're not cool Bots, remember?
translation.es: Los bots geniales hacen botvids. Nosotros no somos geniales.

translation.en: Well, not YET! Sure, you're a little weird,
and one of you, not saying who, is distractingly unhygienic
translation.es: y uno de ustedes es muy antihigiénico…

translation.en: He could mean anybody really.
but once we make BotVids for each of you and get them to play on that moving wall,
translation.es: Pero cuando hagamos botvids y los reproduzcamos,

translation.en: your generalized greatness will be apparent
and all the Squads will forget about how much they hate us! You in?
translation.es: y los squads olvidarán que nos odian. ¿De acuerdo?

translation.en: A half- shrug of acceptance? That's all I need!
Whoa! What are all these things? Emm no idea. Nerd stuff?
translation.es: - ¿Y estas cosas? - No sé, ¿cosas de nerds?

translation.en: Who you calling nerd, nerd?
Fomo! These are who I was telling you about!
Oh, I know. Everyone knows about you Lost Bots.
translation.es: Lo sé. Todos conocen a los Lost Bots.

translation.en: Echh. I can't believe you broke The Sacred Rule!
translation.es: No puedo creer que rompieran la regla sagrada.

translation.en: Okay, well Fomo here is gonna film your BotVids for you.
Hold up on the thanks, loser- trons.
Fomo is in this for Fomo!
Yeah, I did not become the top influencer in Mall
translation.es: No me convertí en el mejor influencer por ayudar a otros.

translation.en: by helping others. - Influencer?
translation.es: No me convertí en el mejor influencer por ayudar a otros. ¿Influencer? ¿Qué haces que la gente haga?

translation.en: What do you make people do?
I make 'em watch sick BotVids.
My lifestyle is my brand!
Which means I need content, content, content.
That is the only reason I'm willing to slum it with you pariahbots.
translation.es: Solo por eso les daré una mano, pariabots.

translation.en: You seem rude but say cool words. So I guess that makes it ok?
translation.es: Pareces grosero, pero dices palabras geniales. Está bien.

translation.en: Let's go with that. Now go. Shoot great stuff.
translation.es: Vamos con eso. Filmen cosas geniales, muestren su personalidad.

translation.en: Show off your personalities!
translation.es: Filmen cosas geniales, muestren su personalidad.

translation.en: Don't worry! Just be yourselves!
No, seriously, they were little robots!
- In the mall! -
Awh, stop laughing! It's not funny!
translation.es: No te rías, no es gracioso.

translation.en: One of them was a cheeseburger!
-  - Aw yeah ok, laugh, laugh. You'll see!
Man. My Mom sure can be mean.
Once you catch one of those Bots in a trap, Dave,
translation.es: Pero en cuanto atrapes uno, Dave,

translation.en: everyone your mom, your boss, that misinformed bus driver,
translation.es: Pero en cuanto atrapes uno, Dave, tu mamá, tu jefe y el conductor del autobús

translation.en: they'll all have to believe you!
Building this should be easy
Yeah, yeah. Easy.
Alright! Ready to show me the gold you captured on video?
Yep! We were kinda nervous at first,
translation.es: Sí. Estábamos nerviosos, pero nos gusta lo que hicimos.

translation.en: but we're really proud of what we got.
translation.es: Estábamos nerviosos, pero nos gusta lo que hicimos.

translation.en: Can't wait. Lay it on me!
When does it start?
Hashtag Kittens?! Why did it say Hashtag Kittens?!
Everybody loves kittens!
You just erased my brain. What were you doing in that video?
The Standing Completely Still Challenge!
Everybody also loves stuff that ends in challenge!
Okay.. I there are no words.
Who's next? Please be good.
Alright! This is more like it!
Enlightening, is it not? My blade is so sharp,
translation.es: Es especial, ¿no? Mi espada es tan afilada que rompe el concepto de realidad.

translation.en: it can slice through our concept of reality itself.
translation.es: Mi espada es tan afilada que rompe el concepto de realidad.

translation.en: The end might be a little off- putting.
Well, mine's ON- PUTTING!
translation.es: Bueno, el mío sí lo es.

translation.en: Roll em, Fomo!
The weight of the world got you down?
Feeling lonely? Listless?
Friendship with Clogstopper can help!
Friendship with Clogstopper can brighten your day with joy!
Ask your doctor if Friendship with Clogstopper
is right for you! Mild to serious side effects
translation.es: Primero, consulten con sus médicos. Los efectos secundarios incluyen hongos, heces e histeria.

translation.en: of Friendship with Clogstopper include random exposure to dangerous fungi, loose stool, and emotional irritation.
translation.es: Los efectos secundarios incluyen hongos, heces e histeria.

translation.en: So? Best one? Or better than best?
translation.es: ¿No es el mejor? ¿O mejor que el mejor?

translation.en: Don't decide yet!
Why would you do that?!
What? It's a fun, sporty prank!
You probably just enraged half the Mall!
For real. Y'all are more hated than ever.
translation.es: En serio, ahora sí que los odian.

translation.en: Yeah, hers didn't really work out. But the rest--
Masterpieces, right?
translation.es: Pero el resto son obras maestras.

translation.en: Master pieces of garbage!
Those are the worst BotVids ever made!
translation.es: Son los peores botvids. ¿En qué pensaban?

translation.en: What were you all thinking?
translation.es: Son los peores botvids. ¿En qué pensaban? En lo que nos dijiste, fuimos nosotros mismos.

translation.en: We were doing what you told us. Just being ourselves.
translation.es: En lo que nos dijiste, fuimos nosotros mismos.

translation.en: I didn't mean your REAL selves!
I meant your better, cooler, FAKE selves that people might actually like!
translation.es: Sino que fueran más geniales para agradarles a todos.

translation.en: How could you mess up such a simple, clear instruction?!
Look. It's my fault. I should've directed this project myself.
translation.es: Es mi culpa. Yo debería haber dirigido esto.

translation.en: Let's just head to the South Wing,
translation.es: Vamos al Ala Sur, pensaré en algo.

translation.en: I'll think of something new. - Yeah, we can't go there.
translation.es: Vamos al Ala Sur, pensaré en algo. No. Ahí están las trampas de la criatura de piel.

translation.en: That's where the flesh creature is setting up his traps.
translation.es: No. Ahí están las trampas de la criatura de piel.

translation.en: His WHAT NOW?!
And they rejected your application to the Engineering Academy, Dave.
translation.es: Y te rechazaron en la academia de ingeniería, Dave.

translation.en: - Well, their loss. -
Ah! I'm late for my rounds!
Is that a new amusement park?
They're traps!
- They are PERFECT! - Explain.
Well, whereas you all see danger, I see opportunity!
translation.es: Ustedes ven el peligro, y yo veo oportunidades.

translation.en: If we can beat these traps, we'll not only protect
translation.es: Si superamos las trampas, protegeremos a los otros bots

translation.en: all the other bots, we will look incredibly amazing as we do it
translation.es: Si superamos las trampas, protegeremos a los otros bots y nos veremos geniales

translation.en: on video!
And when our Squads all see it, they'll be BEGGING us to join them!
translation.es: Y cuando los squads lo vean, nos rogarán que volvamos.

translation.en: Look, these are called traps which makes me think there will be some kind of trapping.
translation.es: Son trampas, y me hace pensar que tienen alguna trampa.

translation.en: What if WE get trapped?
Well, you're certainly not gonna beat the traps
translation.es: No las superarás con esa actitud.

translation.en: with that attitude! Now let's get started,
translation.es: No las superarás con esa actitud. Empecemos. Las rondas son de 20 minutos.

translation.en: the flesh being's rounds only take twenty minutes.
translation.es: Empecemos. Las rondas son de 20 minutos.

translation.en: Uhm why are there loose bolts here?
And batteries in a jar?
And oil?
You gotta be kidding me. They're lures!
These are robot stereotypes! Come on!
Does he really think we eat nuts and bolts?
Is it possible the flesh creature built these with a blindfold on?
Oh good! We don't have to do this!
Bad! We need these traps to work
if we're going to impress everyone.
translation.es: Deben funcionar si queremos sorprenderlos. ¿Para qué? No las reconstruiremos

translation.en: So? It's not like we're gonna rebuild them properly
and put ourselves in more danger just to look better on video.
translation.es: para arriesgarnos más para salir mejor en el video.

translation.en: Yeah! Great idea! Let's do that!
Hey, great work! We should think about applying to an Engineering Academy.
translation.es: Gran trabajo. Deberíamos aplicar a una academia de ingeniería.

translation.en: We have our first viewer!
BotBots.
This is only the beginning! Once we make this BotVid,
translation.es: Esto es el comienzo. Cuando hagamos el botvid, firmarán autógrafos.

translation.en: you'll be signing autographs for everyone!
translation.es: Cuando hagamos el botvid, firmarán autógrafos.

translation.en: No. I will never write my own name.
Ack! The flesh beast is only three minutes away!
We have to make our cinematic masterpiece!
- Let's go! - Woah, watch it, coach!
translation.es: Hagamos nuestra obra maestra. Cuidado, hay aceite.

translation.en: - Oil slick. - Good catch, Kikmee.
translation.es: Cuidado, hay aceite. Bien, Kikmee. ¡Todos a sus posiciones!

translation.en: Now everyone, on your ones!
- Fomo, you ready? - Readier than you dweebs.
translation.es: Fomo, ¿listo? Más listo que los raros.

translation.en: Okaaay hit record!
Hey bots! BT here,
and we couldn't help but notice the flesh creature set up a series of traps for all of us. OH NO!
translation.es: Estuve viendo que la criatura de piel nos puso trampas.

translation.en: But never fear
your brave and indisputably cool heroes are here to shut this down.
translation.es: sus valientes y geniales héroes eliminarán todo.

translation.en: We're really doin' it! We're actually coool!
And that is a wrap on the traps!
YES! MONEY! Oh!
This'll be the way sickest BotVid yet!
That was amazing! There is no way we don't look coo
translation.es: Fue increíble. No hay forma que no nos veamos ge…

translation.en: Huh. The traps went off, but no robots?
I built these perfectly, so-- WHAT?!
Oh YES!
Why don't you laugh at this mom. Laugh with your face, laugh--
translation.es: ¡Sí! ¡Ríete de esto, mamá! Ríete con la cara, ríete…

translation.en: -- at me for another night.
I'll find you robots, I swear.
Thanks for the save, Bonz- Eye. Now let's see how the other Bots react!
translation.es: Gracias, Bonz-Eye. ¡Veamos cómo reaccionan los demás!

translation.en: Are you showing it? Our brilliance? Our transcendent filmic experience?
Better b- b- believe! I got it on loop!
What is this? This isn't us!
No, it's BETTER!
I have a keen eye for fails,
and when I saw Sprinkleberry headed for that oil,
oooh, I knew exactly where the MONEY was!
translation.es: supe que era la mejor toma.

translation.en: Hey, look at the bright side, sir.
Sure, no one saw it, but we DID beat all those traps.
translation.es: Nadie lo vio, pero sorteamos las trampas.

translation.en: And we did it by being ourselves!
Which was your idea if I remember.
You know, good point.
It's not our fault other bots don't have discerning taste
translation.es: No es culpa nuestra que los bots tengan mal gusto

translation.en: and will laugh at the stupidest stuff on a BotViii-- .
translation.es: No es culpa nuestra que los bots tengan mal gusto y se rían de las estupideces de un botvid…

translation.en: Uh, hashtag kittens?
